name: The Maharaja
description: "The maharaja" is a portrait of an Indian King made in an aesthetically pleasing Indian, traditional miniature painting style. Miniature paintings are known for their delicate details and unique two-dimensional representation of scenes, portraits, storytelling etc. This art form flourished during the Mughal period in India as one of the royal art forms of the court. However, later on, it spread to other parts of India and merged with local aesthetics, and gave birth to different types of miniature painting styles.
